Activity: Check emails and review any feedback from the design team regarding the materials shared.
Make revisions to the thematic motifs based on the feedback received from the design team.
Start composing the first early version of the compositions for the selected motifs.
Continue composing melodies and harmonies that reflect the thematic motifs.
